item.title: If this ain't a modern NMS, then what is?
item.description: Leveraging Event Driven Ansible (EDA) and Kentik platform to achieve a simple use case: Ad-hoc shipping of streaming telemetry metrics into Kentik NMS. We are going to see how we can leverage Kentik’s EDA to start collecting ST metrics once mitigations are fired up in the Portal

item.title: K~ustom Metrics in Kentik NMS
item.description: Showcasing the capabilities of Kentik NMS to define custom metrics and display them in the Portal. We are going to see how to configure Kentik’s Universal agent to poll custom SNMP and ST metrics from devices and display them in Metrics Explorer in the Portal
